name: Disc Life
description:
Welcome to Disc Life!

Your father, Papa Disc, has fallen ill with a rare disc sickness that seems almost impossible to cure. Now, he's trusting you, his tiny disc son, to take care of him, taking his place as the blood provider for the family. Venture to the ship's disc rooms to chase humans for their blood, and meet the shopkeeper to buy helpful items in your hunt. Bigger discs swarm the hunting grounds too, and will take any opportunity they can to bully you out of your hard earned kills. Can you survive and save your father?

All art, music, code, and of course, really stupid disc jokes, were made by me.

Controls:

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move around or select different items in the hub world.

X to Confirm

Shift to Dash (once unlocked) and to switch between shop and home base.
